title: Learnable Numerical Input Normalization for Tabular Representation Learning based on B-splines
details: MK Suh, M Eo, YS Sim, W Lim - NeurIPS 2024 Third Table Representation Learning …
abstract: Input normalization of numerical features is essential for improving the performance and training stability of neural networks. This is particularly important in tabular deep learning, where the heterogeneity of features requires different normalization for …
